content: <ce:section-title>Experimental procedure</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">High ordered AAO templates with pore diameter of about 50–200 nm were used from commercial porous alumina templates (Whatman 6809 7013). The electrolyte solution was prepared from NiSO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf> (0.05 M), NaH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>PO<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (0.04 M), NaC<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (0.01 M) and Na<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>C<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf> (0.005 M). One side of AAO templates was sputtered with 200 nm Au film as catalytic layer. The coated template was first immersed in an aqueous solution and kept at low vacuum environment to enhance the solution into the pores. Subsequently, Ni<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>P nanowire arrays were deposited in the pores from the electrolyte solution at 80–95 °C and pH 3–6 adjusted by sulfuric acid and ammonia. For obtaining the isolated Ni<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>P nanowire arrays, the Ni<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>P deposited AAO was dissolved in 5 wt% NaOH solution at 25 °C for 20 min and then slightly washed several time to remove the original AAO template.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Experimental procedure

High ordered AAO templates with pore diameter of about 50-200 nm were used from commercial porous alumina templates (Whatman 6809 7013). The electrolyte solution was prepared from NiSO4 (0.05 M), NaH2PO2 (0.04 M), NaC2H3O2 (0.01 M) and Na3C6H5O7 (0.005 M). One side of AAO templates was sputtered with 200 nm Au film as catalytic layer. The coated template was first immersed in an aqueous solution and kept at low vacuum environment to enhance the solution into the pores. Subsequently, NiP nanowire arrays were deposited in the pores from the electrolyte solution at 80-95°C and pH 3-6 adjusted by sulfuric acid and ammonia. For obtaining the isolated NiP nanowire arrays, the NiP deposited AAO was dissolved in 5 wt% NaOH solution at 25°C for 20 min and then slightly washed several time to remove the original AAO template.

processes.working electrode: AAO templates with 200 nm Au film
